The new closing time is the latest we can support following our recent enhancements. If 5am BJT is difficult for your side to support operationally due to business hours, you are welcome to submit your files earlier (i.e. the night prior) so long as you send a matching confirmation email notifying us at the time that it will be your final submission for the HK IPO in question.

Because of this, they play a key role in building reliable large-scale software systems.
Consensus algorithms allow a collection of machines to work as a coherent group that can survive the failures of some of its members.
Raft also includes a new mechanism for changing the cluster membership, which uses overlapping majorities to guarantee safety.

Returns the input stream connected to the normal output of the subprocess

Returns the output stream connected to the normal input of the subprocess. Output to the stream is piped into the standard input of the process represented by this Process object. If the standard input of the subprocess has been redirected using ProcessBuilder.redirectInput then this method will return a null output stream. Implementation note: It is a good idea for the returned output stream to be buffered.

it seems a process reaper is related to the Linux kernel process management and is a daemon thread. It maintains the process state so that resources can be freed/released/collected on process termination and so on
